description: Editor in chief Nancy Shute discusses the challenges communities face after the January wildfires in Los Angeles.
title: After the fires, LA’s long, hard road to recovery

description: Location, location Scientists launched a rocket from Svalbard, Norway, that measured Earth’s ambipolar electric field for the first time. The weak field may control the shape and evolution of the upper atmosphere and may contribute to Earth’s habitability, astronomy writer Lisa Grossman reported in “At long last, scientists detect Earth’s hidden electric field.” Reader Jayant […]
title: Readers discuss Earth’s hidden electric field, black hole measurements, more
